articles.description: Purdue will look to spoil former Wisconsin star Frank Kaminsky's homecoming on Thursday when the No. 6 Boilermakers visit the Badgers in Madison, Wis.
articles.headline: No. 6 Purdue tries to end two-game skid

articles.description: Duke freshman Marvin Bagley III will miss his second straight game due to a mild right knee sprain.
articles.headline: Bagley ruled out against Virginia Tech

articles.description: Auburn head coach Bruce Pearl joins The Paul Finebaum Show to discuss why facing UK is a great opportunity and give an update on the status of Bryce Brown.

articles.description: Attorneys for former Adidas executives James Gatto and Merl Code and former sports agent Christian Dawkins are expected to argue in court Thursday that what their clients are accused of doing doesn't constitute a federal crime.
articles.headline: Ex-Adidas execs, agent want federal charges dropped in corruption case

articles.description: Marvin Bagley III, the ACC's leading scorer and rebounder, will miss Duke's game against Virginia Tech on Wednesday night due to a mild right knee sprain.
articles.headline: Knee will sideline Duke's Marvin Bagley III for second straight game
